players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice, I think you are lying. I was with Charlie. No one else could have done it."
Charlie: "Diana was killed, so mafia is still alive. Bob, your alibi is shaky. Alice's claim also seems off."
You: "I investigated Bob and found him to be mafia. Bob, you know I'm detective. I will vote for you."
You: "Bob is mafia, I investigated him. He knows I'm detective. Charlie is innocent. Vote Bob."
Charlie: "Bob, you claim you were with me, but Alice says you are mafia. I think you are mafia."
Bob: "Alice, your investigation is wrong. I was with Charlie. Charlie says I'm mafia. That means Charlie is lying. So Charlie is mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
